column2: "Na aber a Rehoboam baa Jerusalɛm no
column4: nyimpa a wɔasan mu eyi mpem ɔha eduowɔtwe a wɔyɛ akofo ano
column6: adan ahendzi no ama Rehoboam bio."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Nyame nyimpa Semaia nkyɛn
column7: na Israel nyinara a wɔwɔ Juda na Benjamin
column12: nkyii so mma wɔnnye hom nuanom nnkɔko: nyimpa biara nsan nkɔ ne fie
column13: na asɛm yi fir mara. Nna wotsiee EWURADZE ne nsɛm no
column14: na wofii Jeroboam do nkɔree no do sanee."

column3: na ɔkyekyeer twitwagye nkurow wɔ Juda."

column20: na Hebron a wɔwɔ Juda na Benjamin mu
column21: nkurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban no."

column2: "Na ɔdze akyɛm na mpeaa kurakuraa nkurow ahorow nyinara mu
column3: na ɔyeyɛɛ hɔn dzendzen mbordo. Na Juda na Benjamin yɛɛ nedze."

column2: "Na asɔfo na Levifo a wɔwɔ Israel nyinara mu no fi hɔn ahe nyinara do kɔr ne nkyɛn."
"Na Levifo no gyaa hɔn mfikyisaase na hɔn enyadze hɔ
column3: na wɔbaa Juda na Jerusalɛm: osiandɛ Jeroboam na ne mba tuu hɔn dɛ mma wonndzi EWURADZE n’asɔfoe:"

column2: "na ɔhyehyɛɛ n’asɔfoe maa mbea sorɔnsorɔm no

column3: hɔn a wɔdze hɔn akoma maa dɛ wobefi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu ahwehwɛ EWURADZE
na wɔhyɛɛ Solomon ba Rehoboam dzen
column4: mfe ebiasa: osiandɛ wɔnantseew David na Solomon kwan do mfe ebiasa."

column2: "Na Rehoboam waar David ne ba Jerimot ne babaa Mahalat
column3: na Jesse ba Eliab ne babaa Abihail;"

column2: "Na ɔno n’ekyir na ɔwaar Absalom ne babaa Maaka; na ɔwoo Abija
"Na Rehoboam dɔɔ Absalom ne babaa Maaka seen ne yernom na no nwewefo nyinara: (na ɔwaar yernom duawɔtwe
column4: na ɔwoo mbabanyin eduonu awɔtwe na mbabaa eduosia.)"

column2: "Na Rehoboam hyɛɛ Maaka ne ba Abija otsitsir
column3: mekyerɛ no nuanom mu ɔpanyin: osiandɛ ɔdween dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no ɔhen."
na ɔdze ne mbabanyin no nyinara mu binom petsee Juda na Benjamin asaase nyinara do
column4: kurow biara a wɔabɔ ho ban mu: na ɔmaa hɔn akɔhomabɔdze piigyan. Na ɔhwehwɛɛ yernom pii memaa hɔn."
